==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|き|しょう|てん|けつ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Initial syllables or characters of {{m|ja|起句||opening|tr=kiku}} + {{m|ja|承句||development|tr=shōku}} + {{m|ja|転句||twist|tr=tenku}} + {{m|ja|結句||conclusion|tr=kekku}}. Compare {{etyl|zh|ja}} {{m|zh|起承转合|tr=qǐchéngzhuǎnhé}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|きしょうてんけつ}}

===Noun===
{{wikipedia|起承転結|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Kishōtenketsu|lang=en}}
{{ja-noun|きしょうてんけつ}}

# The [[structure]] of a [[narrative]], with [[introduction]], [[development]], and [[conclusion]].
# A type of four-line poem (compare {{m|ja|絶句|tr=zekku}}).
# A standard four-part structure of [[Chinese]] or [[Japanese]] [[literature]].
